ygData.messageBody:
>
> what you think about other races?
>

All I can say is that I love my Gnome. Right now my Int is only 130, but with a
decent group I'm never using more than 20% mana in a fight anyway (unless things
get ugly). I've gotten my Dex up to 101 and at level 12 I regain concentration
at least once every 2 fights. That is when the mob gets to me :). High
dexterity and intelligence is great for trade skills. I'll gain 2 skill points
for every three to four attempts while baking and brewing, and have a success
rate much higher than the spoiler boards predict. I certainly hopes this holds
true when it comes to spell research. I think Gnomes will hold a very clear
advantage in this area. I just wish we had more choices when it comes to our
robe selection.

Cheers
Malkin
